PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: Lords, Officers, Citizens, Boy, and Attendant.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. An apartment in the DUKE'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DUKE VINCENTIO, ESCALUS, Lords and
Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A Street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Provost, CLAUDIO, JULIET, and Officers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A monastery.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO and FRIAR THOMAS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A hall In ANGELO's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter ANGELO, ESCALUS, and a Justice, Provost,
Officers, and other Attendants, behind
Enter ELBOW, and Officers with FROTH and POMPEY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Another room in the same.
SCENE III. A room in a prison.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, severally, DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as a
friar, and Provost

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A room in ANGELO's house.
SCENE I. A room in the prison.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before, CLAUDIO,
and Provost

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The street before the prison.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, on one side, DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as
before; on the other, ELBOW, and Officers with POMPEY
Enter ESCALUS, Provost, and Officers with MISTRESS OVERDONE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The moated grange at ST. LUKE's.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MARIANA
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A room in the prison.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Provost
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Another room in the same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A room in ANGELO's house.
SCENE V. Fields without the town.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO in his own habit, and FRIAR PETER

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. Street near the city gate.
SCENE I. The city gate.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
MARIANA veiled, ISABELLA, and FRIAR PETER, at their
stand. Enter DUKE VINCENTIO, VARRIUS, Lords,
ANGELO, ESCALUS, LUCIO, Provost, Officers, and
Citizens, at several doors
FRIAR PETER and ISABELLA come forward

SPEECH.SPEAKER: DUKE VINCENTIO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: ISABELLA is carried off guarded; and MARIANA comes forward

SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Re-enter Officers with ISABELLA; and Provost with
the DUKE VINCENTIO in his friar's habit

Pulls off the friar's hood, and discovers DUKE
VINCENTIO
Exeunt ANGELO, MARIANA, FRIAR PETER and Provost
Re-enter ANGELO, MARIANA, FRIAR PETER, and Provost

Re-enter Provost, with BARNARDINE, CLAUDIO muffled,
and JULIET
